plot: A man and a woman centaur sat in dunes. Transistor, ball and castle. It's raining on the sea. A boat passes on the horizon. It's a centaur galloping in the immensity dark sky. Everything will be covered, erased by the sea.
title: Flux Terschelling
plot_es: A man and a woman centaur sat in dunes. Transistor, ball and castle. It's raining on the sea. A boat passes on the horizon. It's a centaur galloping in the immensity dark sky. Everything will be covered, erased by the sea.
plot_en: A man and a woman centaur sat in dunes. Transistor, ball and castle. It's raining on the sea. A boat passes on the horizon. It's a centaur galloping in the immensity dark sky. Everything will be covered, erased by the sea.
